body:
Numdiff can be used to compare similar files line by line and field by field, ignoring small numeric differences or/and different numeric formats. Equivalently, Numdiff is a program with the capability to appropriately compare files containing numerical fields (and not only). http://www.nongnu.org/numdiff/

Very similar to ndiff, but with additional features that we use for regression testing.
title: Provide new package numdiff
